name: InGame.exe
description:
It's year 2079. One of the best policemans have been fired and a strange floppy disk falls into his hands. When he tried to run it on his PC, he found himself in the digital world. In this world exists a virus, that intends to destroy everything around. Only the protagonist can stop the virus and get back from digital world.
 
 
Features:
 
- A game has the spirit of classic shooters 90
- Various weapons
- A lot of music
- Pixel slideshows
- Bosses
- Dialogues with characters reaction
